nodes.text: Arden was a male servant who attended a royal reception at King Rilvvan K'ntarr's mansion on Rydonni Prime during the Galactic Civil War. He was to have a tryst with the king's daughter, Princess Kalieva K'ntarr, but Kalieva accidentally met with professional thief Sienn Sconn instead. Sconn later impersonated Arden when Kalieva attempted help the thief gain access to an Imperial prototype weapon.
